body.p: Notice: all usage examples are for global installation only!
body.pre: -h, --help display full list of options -f <file> change default build file name -d, --config-file-dir <directory> change directory containing build configuration file -t, --timeout <miliseconds> default timeout for task execution -e, --exclusive <phase name> run default or provided phase exclusively --no-color remove coloring for CLI messages --list-tasks list available build tasks --list-phases list phases that are loaded from configuration file --show-configuration show loaded and merged configuration
